mapper.select: SELECT S.SPACE_NO, S.SPACE_TITLE, S.SPACE_SUBTITLE, S.STATUS, SA.ORIGIN_NAME, SA.CHANGE_NAME FROM SPACE S, SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA, SPACE_CATEGORY SC WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.SPACE_NO = SA.SPACE_NO AND SA.STEP = 1 AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{mbti}||'%'

SELECT S.SPACE_NO , SC.CATEGORY_NAME , SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL , S.SPACE_TITLE , S.SP_TYPE , S.SPACE_SUBTITLE , S.SPACE_DESCRIPTION , S.ADDRESS , S.HASHTAG , SA.STEP , SA.CHANGE_NAME , AAA.LIKECOUNT , BBB.GRADEAVG
, CCC.MYLIKELIST
, EEE.PRICE FROM SPACE S, SPACE_CATEGORY SC, SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA , (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, COUNT(LL.SPACE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM LIKE_LIST LL, SPACE S WHERE LL.SPACE_NO(+) = S.SPACE_NO GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ORDER BY 1 ) AAA , (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, NVL(ROUND(AVG(SR.GRADE), 0), 0) GRADEAVG FROM SPACE_REVIEW SR, RESERVATION R, ROOM RO, SPACE S WHERE SR.ORDER_ID(+) = R.ORDER_ID AND R.ROOM_NO(+) = RO.ROOM_NO AND RO.SPACE_NO(+) = S.SPACE_NO GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ORDER BY 1 ) BBB
, (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, count(B.MYLIKE) MYLIKELIST FROM SPACE S LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT LL.SPACE_NO, COUNT(LL.SPACE_NO) AS MYLIKE FROM MEMBER M, LIKE_LIST LL WHERE LL.MEMBER_NO(+) = M.MEMBER_NO
AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
GROUP BY LL.SPACE_NO ) B on (S.SPACE_NO = B.SPACE_NO) GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ) CCC
, (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, MIN(PRICE) PRICE, RO.START_DATE, RO.END_DATE FROM SPACE S, ROOM RO WHERE S.SPACE_NO(+) = RO.SPACE_NO
AND #{checkIn} BETWEEN RO.START_DATE AND RO.END_DATE AND #{checkOut} BETWEEN RO.START_DATE AND RO.END_DATE
AND RO.PEOPLE_COUNT >= #{people}
GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO, RO.START_DATE, RO.END_DATE ORDER BY 1 ) EEE WHERE S.SPACE_NO = SA.SPACE_NO AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND SA.STEP = 1 AND S.SPACE_NO(+) = AAA.SPACE_NO AND S.SPACE_NO = BBB.SPACE_NO
AND S.SPACE_NO = CCC.SPACE_NO
AND S.SPACE_NO = EEE.SPACE_NO and ( S.SPACE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or S.SPACE_SUBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or S.SPACE_DESCRIPTION like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or S.ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or S.HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
AND EEE.PRICE BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice}
AND SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL=#{category}
AND S.ADDRESS LIKE '%제주시%'
AND S.ADDRESS LIKE '%서귀포시%'
ORDER BY S.SPACE_NO DESC
SELECT SP_TYPE, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DETAIL FROM SPACE_CATEGORY
SELECT * FROM SPACE_FACILITY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SPACE_NO, sc.CATEGORY_DETAIL, m.NICKNAME, SPACE_TITLE, ADDRESS FROM SPACE s JOIN SPACE_CATEGORY sc USING(SP_TYPE) JOIN MEMBER m USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE s.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY SPACE_NO DESC

SELECT SPACE_NO, sc.CATEGORY_DETAIL, m.NICKNAME, SPACE_TITLE, ADDRESS FROM SPACE s JOIN SPACE_CATEGORY sc USING(SP_TYPE) JOIN MEMBER m USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE s.STATUS='Y'
AND CATEGORY_DETAIL
AND ADDRESS
AND SPACE_TITLE
AND NICKNAME
LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY SPACE_NO DESC

SELECT S.SPACE_NO , SC.CATEGORY_NAME , SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL , S.SPACE_TITLE , S.SP_TYPE , S.SPACE_SUBTITLE , S.SPACE_DESCRIPTION , S.ADDRESS , S.HASHTAG , SA.STEP , SA.CHANGE_NAME , MIN(R.PRICE) "PRICE" , AAA.LIKECOUNT , BBB.GRADEAVG
, CCC.MYLIKELIST
FROM SPACE S, SPACE_CATEGORY SC, SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA, ROOM R , (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, COUNT(LL.SPACE_NO) LIKECOUNT FROM LIKE_LIST LL, SPACE S WHERE LL.SPACE_NO(+) = S.SPACE_NO GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ORDER BY 2 ) AAA , (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, NVL(ROUND(AVG(SR.GRADE), 0), 0) GRADEAVG FROM SPACE_REVIEW SR, RESERVATION R, ROOM RO, SPACE S WHERE SR.ORDER_ID(+) = R.ORDER_ID AND R.ROOM_NO(+) = RO.ROOM_NO AND RO.SPACE_NO(+) = S.SPACE_NO GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ORDER BY 1 ) BBB
, (SELECT S.SPACE_NO, count(B.MYLIKE) MYLIKELIST FROM SPACE S LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT LL.SPACE_NO, COUNT(LL.SPACE_NO) AS MYLIKE FROM MEMBER M, LIKE_LIST LL WHERE LL.MEMBER_NO(+) = M.MEMBER_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY LL.SPACE_NO ) B on (S.SPACE_NO = B.SPACE_NO) GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO ) CCC
WHERE S.SPACE_NO = SA.SPACE_NO AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND S.SPACE_NO = R.SPACE_NO AND S.SPACE_NO(+) = AAA.SPACE_NO AND S.SPACE_NO = BBB.SPACE_NO
AND S.SPACE_NO = CCC.SPACE_NO
AND SA.STEP = 1 AND S.STATUS='Y' AND SC.CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName}
AND R.PRICE BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice}
AND #{checkIn} BETWEEN R.START_DATE AND R.END_DATE AND #{checkOut} BETWEEN R.START_DATE AND R.END_DATE
AND SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL=#{category}
AND R.PEOPLE_COUNT>= #{people}
AND S.ADDRESS LIKE '%제주시%'
AND S.ADDRESS LIKE '%서귀포시%'
GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO , SC.CATEGORY_NAME , SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL , S.SPACE_TITLE , S.SP_TYPE , S.SPACE_SUBTITLE , S.SPACE_DESCRIPTION , S.ADDRESS , S.HASHTAG , SA.STEP , SA.CHANGE_NAME , AAA.LIKECOUNT , BBB.GRADEAVG
, CCC.MYLIKELIST
ORDER BY S.SPACE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(LL.SPACE_NO) FROM LIKE_LIST LL, SPACE S WHERE LL.SPACE_NO(+) = S.SPACE_NO AND LL.SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} GROUP BY S.SPACE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT S.SPACE_NO, SC.CATEGORY_NAME, SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME AS SELLER_NAME, S.SPACE_TITLE, S.SPACE_SUBTITLE, S.SPACE_DESCRIPTION, S.ADDRESS , S.LATITUDE , S.LONGITUDE , S.HASHTAG , S.STATUS , S.COUNT FROM SPACE S, SPACE_CATEGORY SC, MEMBER M WHERE S.SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND M.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO
SELECT * FROM SPACE_ATTACHMENT JOIN SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo}
SELECT * FROM SPACE_FACILITY JOIN FACILITY_SPACE USING(SF_NO) WHERE SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo}

SELECT S.*, SA.ORIGIN_NAME AS ORIGIN_NAME, SA.CHANGE_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME, SC.* FROM SPACE S, SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA, SPACE_CATEGORY SC, ROOM R WHERE S.SPACE_NO = SA.SPACE_NO AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND R.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND r.room_NO = ${roomNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y' AND SA.STEP = 1

SELECT S.SPACE_NO, SC.CATEGORY_DETAIL, S.SPACE_TITLE , SA.ORIGIN_NAME, SA.CHANGE_NAME FROM SPACE S, SPACE_CATEGORY SC, MEMBER M, LIKE_LIST L, SPACE_ATTACHMENT SA WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = L.MEMBER_NO AND L.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND S.SP_TYPE = SC.SP_TYPE AND S.SPACE_NO = SA.SPACE_NO AND L.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SA.STEP = 1 AND S.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE_REVIEW SR, SPACE S, RESERVATION R, ROOM RO WHERE SR.ORDER_ID = R.ORDER_ID AND R.ROOM_NO = RO.ROOM_NO AND RO.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND S.SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} AND SR.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT SR.*, M.NICKNAME, M.CHANGE_NAME, S.SPACE_NO FROM SPACE_REVIEW SR, SPACE S, RESERVATION R, ROOM RO, MEMBER M WHERE SR.ORDER_ID = R.ORDER_ID AND R.MEMBER_no = M.MEMBER_NO AND R.ROOM_NO = RO.ROOM_NO AND RO.SPACE_NO = S.SPACE_NO AND S.SPACE_NO = #{spaceNo} AND SR.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT * FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO=(SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='SEQ_SNO')-1
SELECT * FROM SPACE_CATEGORY JOIN SPACE_FACILITY sf USING(CATEGORY_DETAIL) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME=#{categoryName}
SELECT SF_NO, FACILITY_NAME, CATEGORY_DETAIL FROM SPACE_FACILITY JOIN SPACE_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_DETAIL) WHERE SP_TYPE =#{spType}
SELECT * FROM SPACE JOIN SPACE_ATTACHMENT sa USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND STEP=1 AND MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY SPACE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE WHERE STATUS='Y' AND MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO=#{sno}
